articles.title: ‘Unprofessional as I’ve seen’: Showboating rookie’s dreadful penalty torched - Fox Sports
articles.description: Look away Fulham fans, this one will hurt.
articles.content:
Currently one point above relegation, Fulham looked set to double that gap after Tom Cairney was fouled in the box late in stoppage time against West Ham.

articles.title: Keeper who ended Van Dijk’s season gets away with second horror tackle - Fox Sports
articles.description: Everton goalkeeper Jordan Pickford has once again escaped punishment for kicking out at an opposition player.
articles.content:
Pickford kicked Manchester United defender Harry Maguire above the knee as the latter attempted a shot in the 60th minute of Evertons 3-1 loss.

articles.title: ‘Frustrated and angry’: Mansour breaks silence on pending Penrith exit - Fox Sports
articles.description: Penrith winger Josh Mansour has opened up on the crunch meeting 48 hours after the Panthers’ grand final loss that saw him told he was no longer wanted at the club.
articles.content:
Mansour, 30, is off contract this year, but enjoyed one of his best seasons as the Panthers took out the minor premiership and got to their first grand final in over a decade.
